HomePage.title: Fullstack Developer
HomePage.description: Hello, I am <name>William Louis-Louisy</name>. I specialize in crafting high-performance, intuitive applications and transform your ideas into robust and scalable digital solutions.

LabModal.title: Welcome to the Lab
LabModal.description: An interactive space for experiments, animations, and UI. Nothing is fixed, everything evolves.
LabModal.tips: Tip: Follow your curiosity. Try hovering, keyboard, and sometimes sound.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Based in Lyon â€” remote-friendly / hybrid within the city / occasional on-site travel across the AuRA region, Paris, and Geneva (~2 hours from Lyon by high-speed rail)

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: Here is a list of projects I've worked on.

TimeLine.freelancer: I support my clients from the initial idea to the production launch of their applications.

WorkingMethods.dry: I avoid any duplication of logic or information. I factor (functions, modules, models) to reduce bugs and the cost of changes.
WorkingMethods.solid: I produce an open source code where each module has a single responsibility by avoiding its dependence on methods that it does not use.
WorkingMethods.kiss: Clear naming, short modules, systematic reviews, continuous refactoring.
WorkingMethods.typescript: TypeScript strict to prevent rather than heal.
WorkingMethods.tests: Pragmatic tests unitaries â†’ integrations â†’ E2E on critical paths.
WorkingMethods.scrum: daily short (blocking points / next increment), objective-oriented planning, demo/review at each sprint, focused retrospective on 1-2 concrete actions.
WorkingMethods.reviewing: small PRs, occasional pair programming, traced merge decisions.
WorkingMethods.communication: indirect by default (issues/PR/docs), direct when necessary.
WorkingMethods.designSystemsDef: design tokens, typed variants, cross-screen consistency, integrated accessibility.
WorkingMethods.wireframeDef: from zero (wireframe â†’ hi-fi) or improvement, respect grids/constraints.
WorkingMethods.multimediaDef: video montage & music composition for product demos (teasers, app previews).
